Sentencas: The effects of addition of 3YSZ (3 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia) on electrical and mechanical properties of 8YSZ (8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia) has been investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Three different composites of 3YSZ/8YSZ with compositions of 10 wt.%, 25 wt.% and 35 wt.% of 3YSZ were prepared by conventional solid oxide mixing followed by sintering.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Microstructures were characterized by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The electrical properties were studied by impedance spectroscopy as a function of temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Biaxial flexural strength and fracture toughness of composite samples were measured by ring on ring and Vickers microhardness indentation methods respectively.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Results of electrical conductivity measurement proved that by increasing the 3YSZ content of the composite samples, the electrical conductivity at high temperatures (T>550 degrees C) decreased while at low temperatures (T<550 degrees C) the conductivity increased.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: In addition, composite electrolytes had lower activation energy of conductivity at both low and high temperatures.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes

Sentencas: It was shown that both toughness and fracture strength of composite samples improved by the addition of 3YSZ particles.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes
Investigation of electrical and mechanical properties of 3YSZ/8YSZ composite electrolytes
